description:
The massively popular Stardew Valley has a bustling mod scene, with tons of passionate fans creating content or adjusting the farming game's mechanics. While mods for some games, like Skyrim and Fallout, feature a lot of wacky content, the Stardew Valley mods are primarily focused on quality-of-life changes and art overhauls.

While developer ConcernedApe has put out several content updates since the launch of Stardew Valley, the passionate mod community on sites like Nexus Mods has been working hard on new content too. Some modders have gone the extra mile to make new areas and NPCs, but many of them have chosen to focus on changing the art style or fix
title: 35 Best Stardew Valley Mods To Use In 2025

description:
8BitDo has announced it is temporarily pausing shipments to the US due to tariffs. The popular third-party controller manufacturer is based in China, the country that has been hit with the highest tariffs by the Trump administration. 8BitDo is one of the largest gaming manufacturers to take this step, but it's demonstrative of what could become a trend.

Here is the full statement posted on 8BitDo's website: "Due to U.S. tariffs, only products from our U.S. warehouse are available for shipping to the United States. China warehouse shipping is temporarily paused."

US tariffs on China are drastically higher than . Rather than asking US consumers to cover cost increases that, in some cases, could double the price of goods, 8BitDo and other manufacturers have made the decision to suspend shipments. This isn't really surprising. 8BitDo, for instance, is known for making s
title: 8BitDo Halts US Shipments Due To Tariffs, But You Can Get Great Controller Deals (For Now)

description:
Season 3 Reloaded arrives in Call of Duty: Black Ops 6 and Warzone on May 1, and this midseason update brings three more multiplayer maps to the game. Activision has released a new trailer to showcase a closer look at all three, including all the details packed into the 4/20-inspired variant of Nuketown.

As shown in the trailer below, there is an in-depth look at all three maps for Season 3 Reloaded. This includes Haven, a brand-new core map set in a large KGB safehouse, and Signal, which is a brand-new Strike map that takes place inside the close-quarters of a submarine bay.
title: See Black Ops 6's New MP Maps, Including A 4/20-Inspired Nuketown Variant

description: The En Passant Triumph has appeared in Destiny 2, and to obtain it you'll need to find and complete an easily missed chess puzzle. For the completionists seeking every Triumph, there are also 60 chess pieces hidden around the Destiny 2 universe for the Ambition and Resolve Pieces achievement.
title: How To Start And Solve The Destiny 2 Chess Puzzle For The En Passant Triumph

description:
HBO's The Last of Us TV series debuted in 2022 and was a big hit, earning rave reviews from critics and fans alike and putting up big viewership numbers. Fans had to wait a while, but Season 2 debuted in mid-April 2025, also to giant ratings and a positive reception. If you're interested in playing the games that inspired the TV show, this post rounds up everything you need to know.

Table of Contents [hide]
  • The Last of Us (2013)

The Last of Us (2013)
title: The Last Of Us: How To Play The Games That Inspired The HBO TV Series

description:
Regular support for Evil Dead: The Video Game ended in late 2023, and at the time, developer Saber Interactive pledged to keep the game servers online for the foreseeable future and address any major issues if they appeared. Curiously, it looks like the game has been delisted on several platforms, as fans noticed its removal from two storefronts.

Spotted by the ThePatMan117 on reddit, Evil Dead: The Video Game is no longer listed for sale through The Epic Games Store or the PlayStation Store. At the time of writing, it can still be purchased through Steam or the Xbox Store, and developer Saber Interactive has yet to provide an update on the state of the game's future.
title: Evil Dead: The Game Has Been Mysteriously Delisted From Several Storefronts
Ace Ventura: Pet Detective 4K Steelbook Preorders Are Up At Walmart After Selling Out Fast At Amazon

description:
Fortnite is gearing up for the new Star Wars: Galactic Battle season on May 2, and now Epic Games and Disney are offering players a free First Order Stormtrooper skin ahead of the big crossover. There's also a Star Wars Watch Party happening and a free Asajj Ventress loading screen you can earn.

From now until August 31, you can unlock the First Order Stormtrooper outfit in Fortnite by connecting your Epic and MyDisney accounts. You don't even need to have Disney+ subscription. This is for the MyDisney account, which is free to sign up for.
title: You Can Get A Free First Order Stormtrooper Skin In Fortnite
Wallace & Gromit Is Getting A Budget-Friendly 4K Blu-Ray Collection

description:
To absolutely no one's surprise, Fortnite Festival's weekly drop of songs is looking very Star Wars-y this week. Epic Games is marking the start of Fortnite's first ever Star Wars season by offering a pair of new jam tracks that come straight from the original Star Wars trilogy soundtrack composed by John Williams: "The Imperial March," and "Lapti Nek (Jabba's Palace)." Both of these will be available in the item shop when Star Wars season launches on Friday. It's possible one or both of the songs will be part of an instrument bundle like the Cantina Band song that dropped last year.

Anybody who's watched much Star Wars should be well familiar with "The Imperial March," Darth Vader's theme from The Empire Str
title: Fortnite Festival Kicking Off Star Wars Season With The Original Jabba's Palace Song

description:
These days Call of Duty is filled with outlandish shop bundles, including animal-themed operators, neon-colorful outfits, and characters like the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles. However, a wacky new operator bundle in Black Ops 6 and Warzone is causing controversy, as some players are calling the bundle's emote a sneaky pay-to-win tactic.

One of the latest shop items in Call of Duty is the Cardboard Commando bundle. This includes an operator constructed out of cardboard boxes, and everything in the bundle is themed around cardboard, too. The controversy comes from the bundle's "Surprise Gift" emote, which allows you to turn into a cardboard box mid-game.
title: Call Of Duty's Latest Emote Is Accused Of Being Pay-To-Win

description: J.R.R. Tolkien fans can save big on the gorgeous Illustrated Edition of the fantasy novelist's best-known work not named The Lord of the Rings or The Hobbit. The Silmarillion Tolkien Illustrated Edition, which includes over 50 sketches, hand-drawn maps, and paintings by the author himself, is on sale for only $32 (was $75). The 57% discount is one of the best we've seen since the hardcover book's release in 2022.
title: The Silmarillion's Gorgeous Tolkien Illustrated Edition Is Cheap At Amazon

description:
In the latest blow to the video game labor community, Electronic Arts has confirmed layoffs at Apex Legends developer Respawn and the cancellation of two "incubation" projects at the studio. About 100 people at Respawn have been affected by the changes, a report said.

More widely, EA is making cuts that affect many people, reporter Jeff Grubb of GameSpot sister site Giant Bomb said. EA Sports FC and Apex Legends underperformed, leading to this latest wave of cuts at EA, GameSpot understands. Dragon Age: The Veilguard might not have performed up to EA's sales expectations, but we understand its performance is not related to the cuts across EA generally.

A skunkworks
title: Apex Legends Studio Cancels Two "Incubation" Projects, Lays Off Staff Amid Big EA Shakeup

description: Steven Spielberg’s iconic film, Jaws, debuted in theaters on June 20, 1975, and to celebrate the film's upcoming anniversary, a new Jaws 50th Anniversary Steelbook Edition is arriving on June 17. Preorders are now open at Walmart and Amazon. We’re expecting this to be quite popular, so reserve a copy soon if you’re interested in adding this 4K edition of the seminal film to your collection.
title: Celebrate Jaws' 50th Anniversary With This New 4K Steelbook Edition Blu-Ray
Zelda-Themed Handheld Controller For Nintendo Switch Is 50% Off At Amazon

description: After grossing over $180 million in 2023, the sci-fi horror film Megan is getting a sequel on June 27. A few days before the new sequel premieres, the original film is getting a 4K Limited Edition Steelbook release on June 24. It’s shaping up to be the most exciting version of the hit sci-fi horror film, as it includes tons of bonus features alongside its exclusive steelbook case. Preorders are now open ahead of its arrival this summer.
title: Sci-Fi Horror Flick Megan Is Getting a Limited Edition 4K Steelbook Blu-Ray Ahead Of Its Upcoming Sequel

description:
The latest teaser for Call of Duty's upcoming weed-themed makeover of Nuketown ended with a reference to a well-known stoner celebrity, Seth Rogen, prompting some to believe he's coming to the game as a playable character.

In the video below, we see Jason Mewes and Kevin Smith as their Jay and Silent Bob characters enjoying a COD match when a player named "CanadianSmokeMonster" joins their party. You can then hear Rogen's unmistakable laugh, suggesting Rogen is indeed this player. Both Mewes and Smith exchange shocked looks, playing up the possibility that Rogen is somehow involved with the upcoming update.
title: You'll Never Guess Who The Next CoD Operator Might Be

description:
The Witcher 4 amped up its production last November, though it won't launch until at least 2027. We know that it will continue the story of the previous games, albeit with Ciri now serving as the series' protagonist, and that former hero Geralt (and his long-time voice actor, Doug Cockle) will still be around in some capacity. However, the voice artist behind The Witcher 3's Yennefer of Vengerberg has said she doesn't know yet if her character will return for the upcoming sequel.

Denise Gough, who now stars in the Star Wars series Andor as Imperial Officer Dedra Meero, wasn't sure if Yennefer would return, much less the level of progress of the game.

"I don't know any of this," Gough told Eurogamer. She also looked back at her initial signing on for the role and was
title: Yennefer Voice Actress Isn't Sure About Returning For Witcher 4

description:
With the surprise launch of Oblivion Remastered last week, there has been speculation about whether Bethesda Game Studios might use the older RPG as the foundation for The Elder Scrolls VI instead of the more streamlined Skyrim. Bruce Nesmith, a developer on the original Elder Scrolls IV, doesn't believe that will be the case.

Speaking with VideoGamer, Nesmith suggested player choices should trump stat management in The Elder Scrolls VI. "We don’t want the game to get in the way," said the former Bethesda developer. "And that's a very modern take on RPGs. And that is actually at the heart of the 'you do it to get better at it'
title: Elder Scrolls 6 Should Probably Focus On Choices Over Stats, Original Oblivion Dev Says

description:
Ubisoft has quietly updated another one of its games, as Far Cry 4 can now run at 60fps on PS5. Curiously, the Xbox 360 version of Far Cry 4 did run at 60fps on Xbox Series X|S using the FPS Boost function, but it was later disabled. Far Cry 4 will also be added to Game Pass this month, so it might also be getting a fresh update.

Far Cry 4 was previously locked to 30fps on PS5, and this graphical improvement (via Reddit) follows a recent trend of Ubisoft revisiting some of its older games. Earlier this week, Splinter Cell: Blacklist was updated to support Steam ach
title: After More Than 10 Years, Far Cry 4 Just Got A Major Update On PS5

description:
Players who experienced The Last of Us Part II since its release in 2020 have anticipated the developments that recently occurred in HBO's The Last of Us Season 2. Those fans are still a few steps ahead of viewers who only know the story through the show. That's why one of Season 2's new cast members, Isabela Merced, recently shared some advice for fans watching the show.

This story contains spoilers through The Last of Us Season 2, Episode 3. Stop reading now if you're not current with the show.

"I think watching this, you have to lean into your feelings that you're feeling in each moment," said Merced via Variety. "I don
title: The Last Of Us Star Says Fans Should "Lean Into Their Frustration"

description:
Enigmatic game developer Yoko Taro has weighed in on the question of AI in game development, saying that AI is set to make human game devs obsolete within 50 years. He predicted that AI would be used to create narratives that are specially crafted towards each player individually.

Yoko Taro, best known for his work on the Nier series, spoke on AI as part of a Famitsu roundtable for upcoming game The Hundred Line: Last Defense Academy alongside Jiro Ishii and two of The Hundred Line's developers.

The developers all agreed that AI will quickly become mainstream in game development, and discussed where that would leave the industry. "I think that AI will make all game creators unemployed. In 50 years, game creators may be treated like bards," Yoko Taro said, predic
title: Nier Director Yoko Taro Says "AI Will Make All Game Creators Unemployed"

description:
When Switch 2 preorders launched in the US last week, physical GameStop stores saw lines around the block for preordering in person. Reports suggest some stores may have been looking to cash in on the coveted preorders by forcing customers to add extra games and accessories to form an expensive bundle, and GameStop corporate is now investigating.

X user and Twitch streamer Elea Tsentzelis posted about his experience preordering a Switch 2 at GameStop's Astoria store, saying the store was "forcing you to buy," accessories by "claiming they can’t process the SKU just for the console."

Tsentzelis later posted a full video of his transaction at the store, where a GameStop employee can be heard asking him to create a bundle with a minimum item quantity. Even after bundling a MicroSD card,
title: GameStop "Actively Investigating" Switch 2 Forced-Bundling Reports

description:
Fortunately for all us girlie pops out there, video games are collaborating with beauty brands more often these days. However, few are as stunning--or luxurious--as this one.

Genshin Impact and high-end beauty brand Charlotte Tilbury have come together to create two special-edition beauty boxes celebrating some of the makeup brand's best-selling products and beloved Genshin Impact hero, Mona Megisus. Inspired by the dazzling astrologist, the boxes and their various contents feature a lovely celestial aesthetic, complete with midnight blue packaging, gold ornamentation, and an abundance of stars and velvet. Both boxes will be available to purchase starting on April 30 for a limited time only and while supplies last.
title: Genshin Impact's Charlotte Tilbury Collab Is As Gorgeous As The Character It Celebrates

description:
Some screenings of A Minecraft Movie have been rowdy to say the least, with fans tossing popcorn and jumping around in their seats. In at least one case, someone brought a live chicken to a theater to get in on the chicken jockey meme. Warner Bros. appears to be leaning into the chaos with a new "Block Party" edition of the movie coming soon that invites viewers to go wild in theaters.

"You know the moments. You know the lines. You love the songs! Now it's time to get loose, laugh out loud, and belt out those lyrics like a true diamond-tier fan," Warner Bros. said in a news release.

The Block Party Edition of A Minecraft Movie screens on Friday, May 2 in North America and select international markets. Warner Bros. said to check with your loca
title: A Minecraft Movie Getting A Theatrical "Block Party" Edition Inviting Viewers To Basically Go Wild
